data.name: XStyleSettings
desc: provides access to certain style settings within an OpenOffice.org component, such as a window, or within OpenOffice.org as a whole.

Note that there are constraints for those settings. For instance, if controls are drawn with the native widget framework, i.e. in the desktop theme's look, then they won't necessarily respect all their style settings, because those have a lesser priority than the native look.

On the other hand, some settings are respected only when rendering the controls in the native desktop/theme look. For instance, without native theming, buttons do not support a \"roll over\" mode, i.e., they're painted the same way, no matter if they mouse hovers over them or not. But with native theming, this changes, as here the general button look is drawn by the system's theming engine, while the text is drawn by OpenOffice.org. In this case, the button respects the ButtonRolloverTextColor when painting its text.

methods.name: addStyleChangeListener
desc: registers a listener to be notified when the style settings change

methods.name: removeStyleChangeListener
desc: registers a listener to be notified when the style settings change

properties.name: ActiveBorderColor
desc: specifies the color of the border of active windows

properties.name: ActiveTabColor
desc: specifies the color of the active tab of a tab control

properties.name: ActiveTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for active UI components

properties.name: ApplicationFont
desc: specifies the application font

properties.name: ButtonRolloverTextColor
desc: specifies the color to use for text on buttons which are hovered with the mouse

properties.name: ButtonTextColor
desc: specifies the color to use for text on buttons

properties.name: DarkShadowColor
desc: specifies the dark portion of the shadow to use for UI elements

properties.name: DeactiveBorderColor
desc: specifies the color of the border of inactive windows

properties.name: DeactiveTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for inactive UI components

properties.name: DialogColor
desc: specifies the background color of dialogs

properties.name: DialogTextColor
desc: specifies the text color of dialogs

properties.name: DisableColor
desc: specifies the text color for disabled UI elements

properties.name: FieldColor
desc: specifies the background color for dialog input controls

properties.name: FieldFont
desc: specifies the font for dialog input controls

properties.name: FieldRolloverTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for dialog input controls which are hovered with the mouse

properties.name: FieldTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for dialog input controls

properties.name: FloatTitleFont
desc: specifies the font to use the title of floating windows

properties.name: GroupFont
desc: specifies the font for dialog elements used for grouping other elements

properties.name: GroupTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for dialog elements used for grouping other elements

properties.name: HelpColor
desc: specifies the background color for dialog elements displaying help content

properties.name: HelpFont
desc: specifies the help font

properties.name: HelpTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for dialog elements displaying help content

properties.name: HighContrastMode
desc: controls whether the an UI component should use a high-contrast mode

properties.name: HighlightColor
desc: specifies the background color for UI elements which are highlighted

properties.name: HighlightTextColor
desc: specifies the text color for UI elements which are highlighted

properties.name: InactiveTabColor
desc: specifies the color of inactive tabs of a tab control

properties.name: LabelFont
desc: specifies the font for label controls

properties.name: LabelTextColor
desc: specifies the text color of label elements in dialogs

properties.name: MenuBarColor
desc: specifies the background color of menu bars

properties.name: MenuBarTextColor
desc: specifies the text color of menu bars

properties.name: MenuBorderColor
desc: specifies the border color of menus

properties.name: MenuFont
desc: specifies the font to use for menus

properties.name: MenuHighlightColor
desc: specifies the background color of highlighted menu items

properties.name: MenuHighlightTextColor
desc: specifies the text color of highlighted menu items

properties.name: MonoColor
desc: specifies the color to use for monochrome control elements such as flat borders of controls

properties.name: PushButtonFont
desc: specifies the font of push buttons

properties.name: RadioCheckFont
desc: specifies the font of radio buttons and check boxes

properties.name: RadioCheckTextColor
desc: specifies the text color of radio buttons and check boxes

properties.name: SeparatorColor
desc: specifies the color of separators between UI elements

properties.name: ShadowColor
desc: specifies the color to use for UI elements

properties.name: TitleFont
desc: specifies the font to use for window titles

properties.name: ToolFont
desc: specifies the font to use for tool elements

properties.name: WindowColor
desc: specifies the background color to use for non-dialog windows

properties.name: WindowTextColor
desc: specifies the text color to use for non-dialog windows

properties.name: WorkspaceColor
desc: specifies the background color to use for document workspaces
